General_Description: '''a''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Dialogue:
Kassandra noticed a job posted on a [[message board]]. *'''Note:'''
''Mania in the beasts, in the men, and in the land. A madness that calls for your blades.''
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
